definition: to fail to see the larger issue (idiom)/to fail to grasp the big picture
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: When George told jokes at the funeral, every one thought his action was off-key.
sentences.chinese: 喬治在追悼會上說笑話，大家都認爲他太不識大體了。
